inlineContent.text: The Service Area cluster provides an interface for controlling the areas where a device should operate, and for querying the current area being serviced.

abstract.text: Communicate with and control smart home devices from a variety of manufacturers.
For all instance methods (reads, writes, commands) that take a completion,
the completion will be called on the provided queue.
